ivardefs.name: basedOn_
ivardefs.desc: A procedure that is fulfilled in whole or in part by the creation of this media.

ivardefs.name: bodySite
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the site on the subject's body where the media was collected (i.e. the target site).

ivardefs.name: content
ivardefs.desc: The actual content of the media - inline or by direct reference to the media source file.

ivardefs.name: context
ivardefs.desc: The encounter or episode of care that establishes the context for this media.

ivardefs.name: device
ivardefs.desc: The device used to collect the media.

ivardefs.name: duration
ivardefs.desc: The duration of the recording in seconds - for audio and video.

ivardefs.name: frames
ivardefs.desc: The number of frames in a photo. This is used with a multi-page fax, or an imaging acquisition context that takes multiple slices in a single image, or an animated gif. If there is more than one frame, this SHALL have a value in order to alert interface s

ivardefs.name: height
ivardefs.desc: Height of the image in pixels (photo/video).

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Identifiers associated with the image - these may include identifiers for the image itself, identifiers for the context of its collection (e.g. series ids) and context ids such as accession numbers or other workflow identifiers.

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Comments made about the media by the performer, subject or other participants.

ivardefs.name: operator
ivardefs.desc: The person who administered the collection of the image.

ivardefs.name: reasonCode_
ivardefs.desc: Describes why the event occurred in coded or textual form.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: Who/What this Media is a record of.

ivardefs.name: subtype
ivardefs.desc: Details of the type of the media - usually, how it was acquired (what type of device). If images sourced from a DICOM system, are wrapped in a Media resource, then this is the modality.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: Whether the media is a photo (still image), an audio recording, or a video recording.

ivardefs.name: view
ivardefs.desc: The name of the imaging view e.g. Lateral or Antero-posterior (AP).

ivardefs.name: width
ivardefs.desc: Width of the image in pixels (photo/video).
